thread.title: richard THOMPSON
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by richard THOMPSON

author: richard THOMPSON
title: richard THOMPSON
text:
lobsters were delayed a day because of blizzard, i was contacted and informed and asked to have shipped the next possible time.
i was answered that they could ship the next day and they did without a hitch, lobsters arrived in florida as promised. great job considering the circumstances!
would recommend to anyone.
